Title: AJAX Control Toolkit to ASP.NET MVC port
Description:
This is a port of AJAX Control Toolkit client components to ASP.NET MVC framework.
It allows to use familiar AJAX Control Toolkit components in newer ASP.NET MVC applications.
HomeWiki:
DISCONTINUED

I will not develop this project any more. If someone want to take it please contact me.

Project Description
This is a port of AJAX Control Toolkit client components to ASP.NET MVC framework.
It allows to use familiar AJAX Control Toolkit components in newer ASP.NET MVC applications.

List of ported controls:
  • AutoComplete
  • Calendar
  • CascadingDropDown
  • CollapsiblePanel
  • ColorPicker
  • NumericUpDown
  • PopupControl
  • TextBoxWatermark

If you need more controls or particular functionality, please create discussion.
